summary: WHEN DROPPING A FRIEND OFF AT HIS HOUSE HE UNBUCKLED HIS SEATBELT GOT OUT OF THE CAR AND THE RED SEAT BELT LIGHT CAME ON ON THE INSTRUMENT CLUSTER AND THE PASSENGER AIRBAG LIGHT REMAINED OFF SHOWING THE AIRBAG WAS STILL ALIVE RATHER THAN LIGHTING UP TO SHOW THAT IT IS OFF. MY CAR HAS BEEN IN THE DEALER TO REPROGRAM THE COMPUTER TWICE TO CHECK WHY WHEN A PASSENGER SET IN THE SEAT THE AIRBAG DID NOT SHOW ACTIVE COMMA AND THE PASSENGER AIRBAG HAS BEEN REPLACED BY NISSAN FOR TEST PURPOSES. THE WARNING SYSTEMS REMAINED ON AS IF SOMEONE WAS SITTING IN THE SEAT UNTIL I TURNED THE CAR OFF AND STARTED IT AT A LATER TIME.
